description: This file defines the 'Home' component for a note-taking frontend application built using LightningJS. It manages displaying a list of notes, viewing/editing selected notes, and creating/deleting notes, integrating various subcomponents for header, list, and editor, as well as state management functions.

classes.name: Home
classes.description: Main LightningJS component for the home page of the note application, handling notes list, viewer, and editor functionalities.

methods.name: formatDate
methods.description: Formats a timestamp into a locale-specific date string.

methods.name: onSelectNote
methods.description: Handles the event of selecting a note from the list, updating application state.

methods.name: onDeleteNote
methods.description: Handles deletion of a specified note.

methods.name: onSave
methods.description: Saves a new note or updates an existing one based on the current mode.

methods.name: createNew
methods.description: Switches the interface into 'edit' mode for creating a new note.

methods.name: $createNew
methods.description: Wrapper method to invoke createNew() from the template event.

methods.description: Wrapper method to invoke onSave() from the template event.

methods.name: editSelected
